launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.CRITICAL.009 \ JNLP_SECRET=b5323ed0ee74851a3e0cb34a9ec3d552a64021f1da8c5d36e8c8479b5971ee9b \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=redhat \ JENKINS_AGENT_SALLOC_ACCOUNT=misc_ci \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-small.sh
